channel.title: Website on Minimalist Programmer - Kevin Guay
channel.description: Recent content in Website on Minimalist Programmer - Kevin Guay

item.title: New Website and Blog
item.description: It started with a book I have always loved book stores. From local mom & pop’s to Barns & Noble. I am also a huge fan of Amazon. Quite the dichotomy, huh? On a recent trip to Boston, I visited a brick and mortar Amazon Book Store. Problem solved. This was, hands down, the best (and probably smallest) book store that I have ever been to. The size forced the inventory to be highly curated, typically an extremely subjective process.
